Title: Applying for Xiaohongshu Business Account
Content: To apply for a Xiaohongshu business account, you need to first authenticate a regular account as a Blue V account. This process involves logging into the Xiaohongshu professional platform and submitting necessary documents, including a business license. The business license should ideally cover areas such as education consulting, information consulting, cultural media, and network technology. If you already have a business license with a broad scope, such as general merchandise, it can also be used. The authentication fee for a Blue V account is 600 RMB. Once authenticated, you can proceed to the Pugongying platform to find and connect with peers in your industry. This platform allows you to search for influencers and content creators in various fields, making it easier to identify and collaborate with relevant accounts. The entire process, from submitting documents to final approval, typically takes three to five business days.

Title: Setting Up and Managing Business Licenses
Content: Setting up and managing a business license is crucial for operating a professional account on Xiaohongshu. The business license should include specific categories such as education consulting, information consulting, cultural media, and network technology. If you don't have an existing license, you can apply for a new one, which usually costs around 100 RMB. The license allows you to authenticate your account and access additional features on the platform. It's important to ensure that the business license is up-to-date and covers all necessary categories to avoid any issues during the authentication process. Once you have the license, you can use it to apply for a Blue V account and subsequently access the Pugongying platform. This platform helps you find and connect with other professionals in your field, enhancing your ability to collaborate and grow your network. Proper management of your business license ensures smooth operations and compliance with platform requirements.

Title: Utilizing the Pugongying Platform
Content: The Pugongying platform on Xiaohongshu is a valuable tool for networking and collaboration. Once you have authenticated your account as a Blue V account, you can log into the Pugongying platform. This platform allows you to search for and connect with influencers and content creators in various fields. You can filter your search based on specific categories such as beauty, food, or any other niche you are interested in. This makes it easier to find peers and potential collaborators who align with your content and business goals. The platform also provides insights into the performance and engagement of different accounts, helping you make informed decisions about potential partnerships. Utilizing the Pugongying platform effectively can significantly enhance your visibility and reach on Xiaohongshu, enabling you to grow your audience and improve your content strategy. By leveraging this platform, you can build a strong network of collaborators and stay updated on industry trends.
